snippet: The move comes after a pricing dispute led to the removal of MSG and MSG Plus at midnight Saturday from the cable operator’s New York metropolitan area and Buffalo systems.
lead_paragraph: The move comes after a pricing dispute led to the removal of MSG and MSG Plus at midnight Saturday from the cable operator’s New York metropolitan area and Buffalo systems.

headline.seo: Time Warner Puts NBA TV in Place of MSG Network
headline.main: Time Warner Replaces MSG Network With NBA TV
